this is a nice strategy game

I have been playing this game for 6 or 7 years. It's really just an amazing game that is based on skill.
If you like trying to be good at something then definitely give this a try. There are limited maps and weapons, the winner is not the person with the most powerful gun but the one who outsmarts and out-aims the other.

Practice aim, learn where to throw smokes, learn some pop-flashes, and come up with strats to beat the enemy team. Super fun, especially if you can get a group of friends to join you.

Counter-Strike Global Offensive je velice dobrá FPS hra až poněkud nedodělaná z důvodu drobných chyb player modelu.Fyzika zbraní je celkem dobře provedená i když se najdou chyby.Fyzika samotná se zdá bez problému,ale zase najdou se chyby.Tato hra má týdenní updaty do je palec nahoru,ale Valve nemá dost aktivní podporu hráčů a to se mi nelíbí na této hře (vývojářích).
Kdo by si chtěl zahrát nějakou FPS (First Person Shooter) tak CS:GO je nejlepší volba na začátek.
Great Game to pass time but introduction of  FEATURED PLAYERS destroyed the game

Premium cheats are too hard to detect, i saw master guardians with prime and high lvl, spinbotting around, fix it . ty valve
